name: EmotionPicker
0:
”Alexa, open Emotion Picker”
”List out the emotions”
”I'm feeling happy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: emotion picker
des:
Emotion Picker is a movie suggestion skill. Unline basic movie suggestions, emotion picker will suggest you a movie based on how are you feeling right now and suggest a movie which is best suited for your mood and emotion.

Emotion Picker supports eight basic emotions namely Happy, Sad, Surprise, Trust, Disgust, Anticipation, Fear and Anger. You can say any of the eight emotions to get movie suggestions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
